@graph.title: Urban memory : history and amnesia in the modern city
@graph.abstract: Urban memory : an introduction / Mark Crinson -- Trauma and memory in the city : from Auster to Austerlitz / Graeme Gilloch and Jane Kilby -- Urban memory/suburban oblivion / Claire Pajaczkowska -- Clocking off in ancoats : time and the industrial city / Mark Crinson and Paul Tyrer -- Concrete and memory / Adrian Forty -- Totemic Park : symbolic representation in post-industrial space / Paul Tyrer and Mark Crinson -- Remembering, forgetting, and the industrial gallery space / Richard Williams -- The future of the past : archiving Singapore / John Phillips -- 9/11 / Neil Leach -- Mnemotechny of the industrial city : contemporary art and urban memory / Mark Crinson.
